sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-imagecarousel', templateUrl: './imagecarousel.component.html', styleUrls: ['./imagecarousel.component.css'] }) export class ImagecarouselComponent { slides = [ { id: 1, image: 'assets/images/image1.jpg', alt: 'First Slide' }, { id: 2, image: 'assets/images/image2.jpg', alt: 'Second Slide' }, { id: 3, image: 'assets/images/image3.jpg', alt: 'Third Slide' }, ]; }
